languages.text: The Arbitrators critical attack on an enemy places {g|f:dd599bf71b4643d7a53546a58d31d245}Fear of Retribution{/g} on all enemies in combat for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: The Arbitrators critical attack on an enemy places {g|f:dd599bf71b4643d7a53546a58d31d245}Fear of Retribution{/g} on all enemies in combat for 1 round.

languages.text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.
languages.original_text: Когда противник на соседней с арбитром клетке проваливает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, арбитр совершает против него {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}. Если несколько врагов провалили такую проверку одновременно, атака по возможности совершается против случайного из них.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a Willpower resistance test for the first time in a round, that enemy provokes an attack of opportunity from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this test at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against a random one.

Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.

Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.
Enemies adjacent to the Arbitrator that fail their Willpower resistance tests provoke an attack of opportunity from the Arbitrator.

languages.text: Yargıcı'nın bitişiğindeki bir düşman, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testini{/g} geçemediğinde Yargıcı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısını{/g} tetikler. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testi{/g} aynı anda birden çok düşman geçemezse fırsat saldırısı, içlerinden birine karşı rastgele tetiklenir.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı'nın bitişiğindeki bir düşman, bir rauntta ilk kez bir İrade direnç testini geçemediğinde Yargıcı'nın fırsat saldırısını tetikler. Bu testi aynı anda birden çok düşman geçemezse fırsat saldırısı, içlerinden birine karşı rastgele tetiklenir.

Yargıcı'nın bitişiğindeki bir düşman, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testini{/g} geçemediğinde Yargıcı'nın fırsat saldırısını tetikler. Bu testi aynı anda birden çok düşman geçemezse fırsat saldırısı, içlerinden birine karşı rastgele tetiklenir.

languages.text: Cada vez que un enemigo adyacente al Arbitrator falle una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} por primera vez durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, ese enemigo provoca un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} del Arbitrator. Si varios enemigos fallan esta {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} al mismo tiempo, el ataque de oportunidad se efectúa contra uno de ellos al azar.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un enemigo adyacente al Arbitrator falle una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad por primera vez durante el asalto, ese enemigo provoca un ataque de oportunidad del Arbitrator. Si varios enemigos fallan esta prueba al mismo tiempo, el ataque de oportunidad se efectúa contra uno de ellos al azar.

languages.text: 当法务官邻近的敌人每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次未通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，该名敌人会触发法务官的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。如果多名敌人同时未通过意志抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，则法务官的借机攻击会随机攻击一名敌人。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.

traits.locale_text: 当法务官邻近的敌人每轮中首次未通过意志抗性检定时，该名敌人会触发法务官的借机攻击。如果多名敌人同时未通过意志抗性检定，则法务官的借机攻击会随机攻击一名敌人。

languages.text: La première fois qu'un ennemi adjacent à l'arbitrator rate un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'arbitrator effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}. Si plusieurs ennemis ratent ce {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} en même temps, la cible de l'attaque d'opportunité est choisie au hasard.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.

traits.locale_text: La première fois qu'un ennemi adjacent à l'arbitrator rate un test de résistance de Force mentale lors d'un round, l'arbitrator effectue une attaque d'opportunité. Si plusieurs ennemis ratent ce test en même temps, la cible de l'attaque d'opportunité est choisie au hasard.

languages.text: アービトレイターに隣接する敵が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めて{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗すると、その敵はアービトレイターからの{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こす。複数の敵が同時にこの{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗すると、ランダムな敵一体に対して機会攻撃する。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターに隣接する敵がラウンドで初めて意志力抵抗判定に失敗すると、その敵はアービトレイターからの機会攻撃を引き起こす。複数の敵が同時にこの判定に失敗すると、ランダムな敵一体に対して機会攻撃する。

languages.text: Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} eines Gegners auf einem Feld neben dem Arbitrator in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zum ersten Mal, provoziert dieser Gegner einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} des Arbitrators. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bei mehreren Gegnern gleichzeitig, erfolgt der Gelegenheitsangriff gegen einen zufällig gewählten Gegner.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.

traits.locale_text: Misslingt die Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft eines Gegners auf einem Feld neben dem Arbitrator in einer Runde zum ersten Mal, provoziert dieser Gegner einen Gelegenheitsangriff des Arbitrators. Misslingt die Probe bei mehreren Gegnern gleichzeitig, erfolgt der Gelegenheitsangriff gegen einen zufällig gewählten Gegner.

languages.text: Когда противник на соседней с арбитром клетке проваливает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, арбитр совершает против него {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}. Если несколько врагов провалили такую проверку одновременно, атака по возможности совершается против случайного из них.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator. If multiple enemies fail this {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} at the same time, the attack of opportunity is triggered against one of them randomly.

traits.locale_text: Когда противник на соседней с арбитром клетке проваливает проверку Воли на сопротивление впервые за раунд, арбитр совершает против него атаку по возможности. Если несколько врагов провалили такую проверку одновременно, атака по возможности совершается против случайного из них.

Когда противник на соседней с арбитром клетке проваливает проверку Воли на сопротивление впервые за раунд, арбитр совершает против него атаку по возможности. Если несколько врагов провалили такую проверку одновременно, атака по возможности совершается против случайного из них.
